honors_and_awards.title: Mother Teresa Excellence Award in Education
honors_and_awards.publication: Integrated Council for Socio Economic Progress
honors_and_awards.description: The Mother Teresa Excellence Award in Education was awarded to me by Shri. H.K. Patil honourable Minister for rural development, Shri M.V. Rajasekharan honourable former minister of state for planning, Dr. P. Selvie Das, former M.P. Rajya Sabha and Ex Vice Chancellor of mysore and Dr. Prem Nath, former Assistant Director General United Nations.

honors_and_awards.title: Young Entrepreneur
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded with the Young Entrepreneur Award in Dubai by Shaikh Zayed (Ex Ambassador of UAE to USA & Spain) and Shri Sunil Shastri (son of Lal Bahadur Shastri)
